article: A jobless man applied for the position of "office boy" at Microsoft.The HR manager 1 _ him,then watched him cleaning the floor as a 2 _ .  "You are 3 _ ,"he said."Give me your email address 4 _ I'll send you the application to 5 fill in ,as well as the date when you may start."  The man replied,"But I don' t have a computer,neither an email." "I'm sorry,"said the HR manager."6 If you don't have an email,that 7 _ you do not exist.And anyone who doesn't exist cannot have the job."  The man left the office,8 _ .He didn't know what to do,with only $10 in his pocket.He then decided to go to the supermarket and buy a 10 kg tomato crate .He then sold the tomatoes in a door-to-door round.In less than two hours,he 9 _ doubling his capital.He 10 _ the operation three times,and returned home with $60.The man realized that he can 11 _ in this way,and started to go earlier every day,and return late.12 _ ,his money doubled or tripled every day.13 _ ,he bought a cart,then a truck,and then he had his own fleet of delivery vehicles.Five years later,the man is one of the 14 _ food retailers in the US.  He started to plan his family's 15 _ ,and decided to have a life insurance.He called an insurance broker ,and chose a protection plan.When the conversation was 16 _ ,the broker asked him his email.The man replied,"I don't have an email."The broker said 17 _ ,"You don't have an email,and yet have succeeded in building an empire.Can you 18 _ what you 19 _ have been if you had an email?!!"  The man thought for a while and replied,"Yes,I'd be a(n) 20 office boy at Microsoft!"
